# xtal2png

Encode/decode a crystal structure to/from a grayscale PNG image for direct use with image-based machine learning models such as [Palette].

[![Open In Colab](https://colab.research.google.com/assets/colab-badge.svg)](https://colab.research.google.com/github/sparks-baird/xtal2png/blob/main/notebooks/1.0-xtal2png-tutorial.ipynb)
